title: Gold Promo's.

embed.description: I haven't been able to play ranked during season 6 (Reasons). My placements put me in Silver 1 (Lucky), so I just played a few more games and got into my promotional series. Instead of doing 3 full games like I did before, I manage to get 30/30/40 mins into 11 mins, so that good.

body:
I got back into Gold, kinda easy.

I haven't been able to play (Reasons)
So I did my placements (Silver 1- Lucky) and climbed back up to Gold.
And I'm glad I did decide to cut these games, I was sick and was coughing a lot.

replies.body: I'm locked screen as well, and probably have better map awareness then a lot of people, you can easily use map to fill in the blanks at the sides of your screen, not to mention it's not hard to unlock it for abilities that require it (EG something like a Zac E.)
Yeah exactly, not really a need to unlock if you pay attention to the map.

Shhh XD, I have it on, 80% of the time. I had some in, of like my team doing things across the map.
But got rid of them.
